type.name: section
type.title: Uniforms not to be worn without authority.
type.context: GUYANA DEFENCE FORCE UNIFORMS ACT under Uniforms not to be worn without authority. 2. (1) No one who is not serving in the Guyana Defence Force may wear, without the Ministers permission, the uniform of that force, or any dress having the appearance or bearing any of the regimental or other distinctive marks of that uniform:  Provided that this enactment shall not prevent  (a)     any  person from wearing the cast off uniform of any of that force if all regimental buttons and other regimental or distinctive marks are removed therefrom; or  LAWS OF GUYANA 4 Cap. 15:03  Guyana Defence Force Uniforms      L.R.O.
